solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--        public int findNthDigit(int n) {--newline--            int len = 1;--newline--            long count = 9;--newline--            int start = 1;--newline--    --newline--            while (n > len * count) {--newline--                n -= len * count;--newline--                len += 1;--newline--                count *= 10;--newline--                start *= 10;--newline--            }--newline--    --newline--            start += (n - 1) / len;--newline--            String s = Integer.toString(start);--newline--            return Character.getNumericValue(s.charAt((n - 1) % len));--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--}
